entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
